name: Rockslide (itch)
description:
Notice! If you want to share your score on Twitter, you may need to enable pop-ups for this page. Watch out for browser notifications!

Survive as long as you can!

Rockslide is a fast-paced action game in which you have to dodge enemies and kick rocks, making them slide and hit them on the face!

Play it directly in your browser.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD: Move and kick rocks.
  • X / Enter: Roll. You can roll to cancel kicks' momentum.
